CFComponent - Class in org.frans.thesis.GUI
This abstract class represents a visual, interactive component on the tabletop and inherits from MTComponent (part of the MT4j-framework)

This class represents a menu item that belongs to a CFComponentMenu.

CFComponentMenuItemListener - Interface in org.frans.thesis.GUI
An interface that represents objects that can act as listener for a menu item, more precisely when a user taps an item.
CFComponentModifiable - Interface in org.frans.thesis.GUI
An interface that represents objects that can be modified by an instance CFComponentModifier.
CFComponentModifier - Class in org.frans.thesis.GUI
An abstract class that represents a component that gets notified automatically when a user moves an interactive component on the tabletop.
